algorithm_technique: Binary search on sorted heaters to find nearest for each house
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum radius for heaters to cover all houses.
problem_summary_technical: For each house, find the closest heater using binary search and determine the required radius.
key_insights: The problem requires finding the maximum of the minimum distances from each house to its nearest heater.
Sorting the heaters array is essential for efficient searching.
Binary search (`bisect_left`) helps find the closest heaters quickly for each house.
